gear.name: Cast iron skillet or pizza pan

cookingTips: Let pizza dough come to room temperature before pressing into skillet; cold dough resists stretching
Precook crust over fire for 2-3 minutes before adding toppings to prevent soggy bottom
Keep toppings minimal so cheese melts before crust burns; too much weight presses down crust
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best technique for cooking pizza in a cast iron skillet over a campfire without burning the bottom?
